text: Satish C. Sharma (11 October 1947 â€“ 17 February 2021) was an Indian politician. He was a member of the Indian National Congress. Sharma was born in Secunderabad, India. He was a member of the Indian Parliament from 1991 to 2004 and again from 2010 to 2016. Sharma was Minister of Petroleum and Natural Gas from 1993 to 1996. Sharma died on 17 February 2021 in Goa, India, aged 73. ==References== Category:1947 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Politicians from Uttar Pradesh
title: Satish Sharma
